Class IdentifierEqAuditExpression

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.envers.query.criteria.IdentifierEqAuditExpression
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AuditCriterion

    public class IdentifierEqAuditExpression
extends Object
implements AuditCriterion
    A criterion that expresses that the id of an entity is equal or not equal to some specified value.
